election_record.label: Pennsylvania 1799 Governor

overview.note: The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA) and The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) report 32641 total votes for James Ross.
The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 37927 total votes for Thomas MacKean.

sub_unit.name: Allegheny
sub_unit.note: The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA) and The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) report 2006 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Berks
sub_unit.note: Der Neue Unpartheyische Readinger Zeitung und Anzeigs-Nachrichten (Reading, PA) reports 3739 votes for Thomas McKean and 828 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Bucks
sub_unit.note: The Journal of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives and Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) list 2175 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Cumberland
sub_unit.note: Thomas McKean received 1 vote as Thomas MacKee.
The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA) and The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) report 1624 votes for Thomas MacKean.

sub_unit.name: Moyerstown
sub_unit.note: Unpartheyische Harrisburg Morgenrothe Zeitung (Harrisburg, PA) reports 115 votes for Thomas McKean.

sub_unit.name: Delaware
sub_unit.note: The Journal of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives, The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) and The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA) list 1154 votes for James Ross.
The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 421 votes for Thomas McKean and 1154 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Chester
sub_unit.note: The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA), October 10, reports 153 votes for Thomas MacKean and 216 votes for James Ross. The issue of October 12 corrects the figures to 150 for Thomas McKean and 261 for James Ross.
The Berkeley Intelligencer (Martinsburg, WV), The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) and The Daily Advertiser (New York, NY) report 216 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Franklin
sub_unit.note: Kline's Carlisle Weekly Gazette reports 936 votes for Thomas McKean and 1358 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Huntingdon
sub_unit.note: The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 464 votes for Thomas McKean.

sub_unit.name: Lancaster
sub_unit.note: The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 3885 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Luzerne
sub_unit.note: Thomas MacKean received 1 vote as Thomas Kane.

sub_unit.name: Lycoming
sub_unit.note: The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 550 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: The Norristown Gazette (Norristown, PA), Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) and The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) report 1795 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Northampton
sub_unit.note: The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 529 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Northumberland
sub_unit.note: The Annals of Buffalo Valley, Der Unpartheyische Readinger Adler (Reading, PA), The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA), The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA) and Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) list 637 total votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Philadelphia
sub_unit.note: The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA), The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA) and Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) report 1137 votes for Thomas McKean and 1612 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Dock
sub_unit.note: The Gazette of the United States, and Philadelphia Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 183 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Blockley
sub_unit.note: Claypoole's American Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 82 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Bustletown
sub_unit.note: The Gazette of the United States, and Philadelphia Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 261 votes for Thomas McKean and 307 votes for James Ross.
The Berkeley Intelligencer (Martinsburg, WV) reports 250 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Northern Liberties
sub_unit.note: The Daily Advertiser (New York, NY) and Berkley Intelligencer (Martensburg) report 999 votes for Thomas McKean.
Kline's Carlisle Weekly Gazette reports 906 votes for Thomas McKean and 200 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Somerset
sub_unit.note: The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 652 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: The 1799 Journal of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives, The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA), The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA) and Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) list 1755 votes for Thomas McKean.

sub_unit.name: Westmoreland
sub_unit.note: The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 1320 votes for Thomas McKean.
Kline's Carlisle Weekly Gazette and Unpartheyische Harrisburg Morgenrothe Zeitung (Harrisburg, PA) report 1210 votes for Thomas McKean and 708 votes for James Ross.

sub_unit.name: York
sub_unit.note: Included in the 2028 total votes for Thomas McKean in York County are 2 votes for a Thomas Meane. The 1799 Journal of the Pennsylvania House of Representatives, Page 35.
The Philadelphia Gazette and Universal Daily Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 2029 votes for Thomas McKean.
The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA) reports 2026 votes for Thomas McKean.
The Aurora. General Advertiser (Philadelphia, PA) reports 2025 votes for Thomas McKean.
